label: thm-closed-form-lipschitz-composite
label_text: Corollary: Closed‑form bound for L_{g_A∘z} (empirical aggregator)
name: Closed‑form bound for L_{g_A∘z} (empirical aggregator)
statement:
Let $k=|\mathcal A(\mathcal S)|$ and assume $|v_i|\le V_{\max}$. For the empirical aggregator of §6.2.2.a (see lem-empirical-aggregator-properties) with the regularized standardization and piecewise rescale of §8.2.2, the composite map $g_A\circ z$ is globally Lipschitz with
$$
\boxed{\;L_{g_A\circ z}\;\le\; \max\{\,L_P,\,1\,\}\;\cdot\; \frac{2 L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} V_{\max}}{\sqrt{k}}\;}
$$
where $L_P=\|P'\|_\infty$ is the uniform derivative bound of the cubic patch from §8.2.2.5.
full_statement_text:
Let $k=|\mathcal A(\mathcal S)|$ and assume $|v_i|\le V_{\max}$. For the empirical aggregator of §6.2.2.a (see lem-empirical-aggregator-properties) with the regularized standardization and piecewise rescale of §8.2.2, the composite map $g_A\circ z$ is globally Lipschitz with
$$
\boxed{\;L_{g_A\circ z}\;\le\; \max\{\,L_P,\,1\,\}\;\cdot\; \frac{2 L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} V_{\max}}{\sqrt{k}}\;}
$$
where $L_P=\|P'\|_\infty$ is the uniform derivative bound of the cubic patch from §8.2.2.5.
relations_established: Establishes global Lipschitz bound for composite map g_A o z
